name: Quest to Kill God
description:
A short RPG Maker game that I've been working on for a while. It's not perfect, but I had a great time working on all the art, programming, and music for this project. I've had a blast working with all my friends who've helped me make this little game. Here are some of their websites and YouTube channels:

Mustard - https://mustardboy.newgrounds.com/

Paradox (Wayne) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr33DbysJdX3_sDeUllmQQA

PrinceEvince (Benji) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzE_Vl6iXe1ZWCmgHwsfoOA

Special thanks to Benji, Wayne, Mustard, and Seth for helping finish this project!
